short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows your IP address and other useful info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension that shows you the IP address that you have today, and other valuable information such as installed plug-ins, screen resolution, etc.
